title: I can't launch League, Directx error (2018)
body:
This has happened before and it went away fairly quickly with the deletion of the game.cfg then a league repair, but not doing all the hotfixes I've found online won't work and it's been affecting other games not just league.
I've been trying for several days now (around 7) to Launch League and a couple of other games on my computer, and I think it's a Directx error, but I don't know what the problem is, I have Directx 12 and a AMD Radeon R9 200 and I was able to launch the actual game fine at the start of the year. I've tried several times to unistall and reinstall. I've been researching this for the past couple of days and any help would be appreciated

replies.body: It's hard to know what's going on without knowing the type of errors you're getting, but we could start with double checking your permissions. Make sure your OS is allowing League to launch and use the files it needs by following the steps listed here in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).

Thank you for taking interest in my problem, the error message is 
"An unkown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer."
I have DirectX 12 and it's fully up to date, and I've gone through and made sure my OS is allowing League to launch, the problem itself isn't in the launcher it's when I go from Champ select to the actual game, I've also used a few forums off of this site and used their hot-fixes and they are not working like the previous 2-3 times this has happened. Any more suggestions on how to fix this would be very much appreciated.
Threads I've already visited about the problem:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3078717 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues

Sorry, I just now found a thread with my solution, thanks so much for helping me though!
Thread with my solution: 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/VLEbhejv-an-unknown-directx-error-has-occurred-and-league-of-legends-cannot-start
It has worked for all the games I had problems with
Sweetness!! Glad you were able to find another resource, sorry I couldn't get back sooner DX!
